Enjoyment over discipline

You've tried everything. It still didn't stick.

The habit tracker. The morning routine. The accountability partner. The course you bought and never finished.

For a few weeks â€” it works. Then life happens. And you're back where you started, wondering what's wrong with you.

Nothing's wrong with you. The approach is wrong.

You're trying to add new behaviors to an old identity. That's like renovating a house on a broken foundation. It doesn't hold.

The people who change for good don't rely on motivation. They change who they are. And that's exactly what this sprint is designed to do.

How the 30-day sprint works

01

Discovery call (Week 0)

We talk for 30 minutes. You tell me who you want to become. Not what habits you want. Who you're trying to be. I listen for what's actually underneath the surface.

02

Your Identity Blueprint

I build you a personalised document: your current vs. target identity, 3 keystone habits designed to feel enjoyable, your lifestyle redesign, and one environmental change to make this week.

03

Weekly check-ins (4 weeks)

Not "did you do the thing?" check-ins. We ask: what felt natural? What felt like a grind? We iterate the blueprint until the new identity starts to feel like home.

04

The shift

By week 4, the behaviors aren't something you do. They're something you are. That's the only kind of change that compounds.

This is for you if...

  • âœ“You want to work with someone, not follow a template alone

Not for: People looking for a quick fix, a magic system, or someone to hand them a PDF and call it coaching.
